show.title: Un Paarvayil Orayiram
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/AdQqCx
show.description: When humble home kitchen owner Sunaina marries Shashvat, she doesn't know he's secretly billionaire Shashvat Ambani testing her genuine love. As she faces cruel humiliation from her son's in-laws and searches for her missing daughter Nishi, a shocking revelation emerges—Shashvat's adopted daughter Aanya is actually Nishi. Through trials of deception, family betrayal, and hidden identities, true love ultimately triumphs.
show.description_secondary: When humble home kitchen owner Sunaina marries Shashvat, she doesn't know he's secretly billionaire Shashvat Ambani testing her genuine love. As she faces cruel humiliation from her son's in-laws and searches for her missing daughter Nishi, a shocking revelation emerges—Shashvat's adopted daughter Aanya is actually Nishi. Through trials of deception, family betrayal, and hidden identities, true love ultimately triumphs.
